column4: I just installed ubuntu 11.10 and on boot am stuck with a black screen and cursor. Please please help
I just installed ubuntu 11.10 and on boot am stuck with a black screen and cursor. Please please help
installing 11.04 and then upgrade to 11.10 seems to work, it did so with my laptop which had the same issue you have now.
Exactly, I just made a fresh install and damn!
